actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require continuation coverage under an employer group health plan for both current and former employees of an employer in bankruptcy proceedings.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require continuation coverage under an employer-provided group health plan for both current and former employees of an employer in bankruptcy proceedings.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require continuation coverage under an employer group health plan for both current and former employees of an employer in bankruptcy proceedings.
